title: Mobile Microlearning Program for Healthcare Quality Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Providing e-learning modules accessible via smartphones for practicing healthcare professionals, with formative assessments to monitor learning effectiveness

learning_goals: Learners can apply hand hygiene management protocols with 90% accuracy within four weeks
Learners can comply with Community-Acquired Pneumonia (CAP) treatment guidelines in practice at an 80% or higher rate
Learners engage in self-directed learning activities at least twice weekly through mobile-based e-learning modules

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
